author: merklefruit
content: Hi all, I have a question on blob propagation in relation with PBS. Is mev-boost-relay partially responsible for propagating the sidecars, or is the proposer able to do so by itself entirely if they wanted?

author: potuz
content: It depends if the relay is also playing timing games and delaying the reply to the proposer to protect from unbundling, then good luck propagating the sidecars in time
